title: Standing female figure
description: Standing Female Figure, beige clay, has large flat earspools with crossed incisions, protruding hair, four strand necklace with pendant ornaments. traces of red and white pigment on hair, earspools amd necklace. Mended, old breaks visible in torso, head and hat, 1/2 in. chip missing in stomach.
creditline: Gift of Lucille and Arthur Weiss
